caption: A sprinkler started working in the garden, and a boy dashed into the water. He picked up a newspaper from the ground, joined by another boy who enthusiastically gathered trash. The two boys lay on the sofa. A man and a woman holding a child entered the house and engaged in conversation in the living room. The man held something up and asked the two boys about it. In a school hallway, many children were organizing their belongings in lockers. A group of kids gathered around a cabinet, talking. In the evening, one boy visited another boy's house. A woman was setting the table, and one after another, blond men appeared at the door. A group of people gathered around the dinner table.

global.question: Do more than 5 people appear in the video?

breakpoint.question: What is the boy holding in his hands?
